name: Intro
_source: s;Morrissey;Simon, before you attack New Dawn, we should develop a plan of attack.
s;Morrissey;We should ideally keep casualties to a minimum.
s;Simon;Well, we should probably attack through the courtyard.{w}{br}It's the least fortified part of the castle.
s;Simon;We can approach safely through the woods nearby.
s;Morrissey;Although, I worry that the enemy might have scouts in the woods.
s;Simon;That makes sense. We'll be on guard.
s;Simon;New Dawn's forces are numerous, but we can prevail if we move as a group.
s;Simon;If we get caught out by an ambush, that could be costly.
s;Morrissey;I have confidence in you, Simon.
s;Morrissey;May you have good fortune on the battlefield today.
s;Morrissey;Two of my most formidable commanders are in your service today.
s;Morrissey;I trust in your command and that they will survive the battle today.
s;Luther;Yes milord, I can hardly believe it myself.
s;Luther;But a grueling battle awaits us here.
s;Simon;We have support from Morrissey, though.
s;Simon;So we have a fighting chance.
s;Luther;Aye, but New Dawn is a formitable foe.
s;Luther;We'll need to be careful.{w}{br}Who knows what they have in store for us here...
s;Simon;Without Morrissey's help, I'm not liking our chances.
s;Luther;We can always retreat and regroup later...
